topic.title: Domain names/pretty URLs?
topic.body:
One thing that bothers me a lot about ZeroNet so far is how yucky the URLs look.

For example, my Twitter URL on the regular web might look like:
https://twitter.com/example

On ZeroMe I'm:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i/1PPVb3FDDiNyNqbdb5UAv8ykEC1K1Nwquy/quenz@zeroid.bit

Would it be possible to make the URLs look nicer?
